name: HordounD
description:
HordounD is a mysterious and prosperous city full of puzzles and mysteries. But the darkness broke out and enveloped the city, hiding it under water.

Explore the mysterious continent and interact with the environment. Make your way through the ancient ruins and solve many puzzles that will meet on your way. Dispel the darkness and breathe new life into HordounD!

Fight ghosts and bandits who will become a real threat to you. Find hidden places and secrets that are hidden from your eyes. Find the legendary sword and fight the ghostly lord who defeated you in the past!

Peculiarities
- A variety of puzzles.
- Colorful graphics.
- Dangerous opponents
- Dispel the darkness and breathe new life into HordounD.
